articles.title: Glenmark Pharma launches drug for treatment of Type 2 diabetes in adults - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The launch of the drug is welcome news for diabetic patients with insulin resistance, which happens to be a common problem in India with every four out of ten diabetic patients showing insulin resistance in India.
articles.content: Glenmark Pharmaceuticals on October 6 announced that it has become the first company in India to launch Thiazolidinedione Lobeglitazone (Lobeglitazone) for the treatment of Type 2 diabetes in adults.… [+2099 chars]
